name: Capitalism (itch) (BzZ7t, Krenity, RockArtist33)
description:
Capitalism: The game

A simple Clicker game designed to mimic CAPITALISM through how it plays. The game is simple. 

Click the printer to "Make" money to spend on "Making" more money, Dont worry about the economy.

Go to the shop and buy the upgrades to "Make" even more money with the number of upgrades that you can buy.

That's it! Nothing else now go play.

Contributors: BzZ7T, Krenity, RockArtist33

Github link: https://github.com/RockArtist33/Lab-4

This game was originally made for a one week school project or "Lab" 
Thank you for taking the time to take a look at our game :)
